entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few showers over eastern sections. Amount 5 mm over eastern sections. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
